long.am,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,kn,nl,sw:
This plugin helps you download private videos, images, and audio from Telegram groups and channels easily. Simple operation allows you to easily obtain multimedia content.

We adhere to the principle of legal use and strongly recommend to avoid downloading unauthorized copyright content.

â¡ï¸Main features:
âœ“ Save audio/video of any channel/group to local computer.
âœ“ Supports one-click multi-select batch/single download of resources in multiple formats,include videos/audio/pictures/GIFs/movies/music/audiobooks/files
âœ“ No passwords, API logins or permissions required
âœ“ Safe and easy to use
âœ“ 24/7 developer support

ğŸ‘‰ğŸ»Simple steps:
1) Install the video downloader plugin: and pin it to your browser.
2) Log in to the Telegram webpage: access your account.
3) Click to download: Click the icon in the upper right corner of the video or picture to download immediately.

ğŸ“Disclaimer:
This plugin is not directly affiliated with the official Telegram app/website but is independently developed by a third party. Please use responsibly and respect copyright.

âœ“ Walang kinakailangang mga password, pag-login sa API o pahintulot
âœ“ Ligtas at madaling gamitin
âœ“ 24/7 na suporta sa developer

This plugin helps you download private videos, images, and audio from Telegram groups and channels easily. Simple operation allows you to easily obtain multimedia content.

We adhere to the principle of legal use and strongly recommend to avoid downloading unauthorized copyright content.

â¡ï¸Main features:
âœ“ Save audio/video of any channel/group to local computer.
âœ“ Supports one-click multi-select batch/single download of resources in multiple formats,include videos/audio/pictures/GIFs/movies/music/audiobooks/files
âœ“ No passwords, API logins or permissions required
âœ“ Safe and easy to use
âœ“ 24/7 developer support

ğŸ‘‰ğŸ»Simple steps:
1) Install the video downloader plugin: and pin it to your browser.
2) Log in to the Telegram webpage: access your account.
3) Click to download: Click the icon in the upper right corner of the video or picture to download immediately.

ğŸ“Disclaimer:
This plugin is not directly affiliated with the official Telegram app/website but is independently developed by a third party. Please use responsibly and respect copyright.

Pemalam ini membantu anda memuat turun video, imej dan audio peribadi daripada kumpulan dan saluran Telegram dengan mudah. Operasi mudah membolehkan anda mendapatkan kandungan multimedia dengan mudah.

Kami mematuhi prinsip penggunaan undang-undang dan amat mengesyorkan untuk mengelak daripada memuat turun kandungan hak cipta yang tidak dibenarkan.
